questionListItems.title: Can I be kept on your mailing list so that you could notify me when there is an event (brown bag lunches, podcasts, etc)?

answer.body: Certainly, please email PST_Innovation@psd.gov.sg with your request and we will add you to our mailing list.

questionListItems.title: Should I approach PSD first or these POCs? If I belong to (a) an agency with no such inno labs; or (b) an agency with inno lab.

answer.body:
If you come from (a) an agency with no such innovation labs, you may reach out to PST Innovation at PST_Innovation@psd.gov.sg for advice on the relevant parties to connect with.

If you come from (b) an agency with an existing innovation lab, you may wish to reach out to the POCs directly for your queries.

questionListItems.title: What can these POCs do for me?

answer.body:
The POCs from other agencies' innovation lab/units may offer you advice and coaching for your existing problem statements or fresh perspectives on improving solutioning for your existing projects.
You may also connect with POCs to call out for more participation for your innovation events and programmes.

questionListItems.title: What funding options are available for innovation projects?

answer.body:
For interagency projects, the funding options available include the WOG PST Budget, WOG Incubator Fund, and Initiation Budget (IB).
Please email MOF-WOG-PST-Budget@mof.gov.sg for more information on the funding resources available.

questionListItems.title: What types of courses are available?

answer.body: Design Thinking training courses are available for all innovators - whether you are a beginner or practictioner. Keep a look out for eDMs sent by PSD or CSC to sign up for e-learning courses on LEARN app or physical workshops (bootcamps and sprints by School of X).

questionListItems.title: Where/How can I learn of others' experiences/success stories?

answer.body: Sign up for one of the upcoming innovation brownbags through eDMs sent by PSD or CSC, read innovation stories and listen to podcasts to learn more about the innovation experiences and success stories of other agencies and companies.

questionListItems.title: Which courses are suitable/recommended for me?

answer.body:
If you are new to innovation and design thinking, sign up for Civil Service College's courses, available on LEARN app.
If you wish to improve your skills in applied design thinking, sign up for DesignSingapore Council's design sprints or design bootcamps.

questionListItems.title: Who are the POCs of innovation labs/units across WOG?

answer.body: Please refer to this list for the POCS of innovation labs/units across WOG. The link is only accessible via your government-issued device.

questionListItems.title: Who can I contact if I need help?

answer.body: Please contact PST_Innovation@psd.gov.sg for any queries.
